org.orgName: United States District Court, For the Western District of Washington, Northern Division

div1.p: Vice Counsul General for the United States of America at the City of Vancouver in the Province of British Columbia Canada do hereby Certify:-

I. That H. C. Shaw Esquire is the Police Magistrate of the said City of Vancouver and was such at the time of the taking of the depositions hereinafter mintioned and as such Police Magistrate has the jurisdictions and powers of a Judge of the Quarter Sessions of the Peace.

2. That the Depositions hereto attached were taken before the said H.C. Shaw Esquire and are in accordance with the laws of Canada and are in due form so that they would be used as evidence in a Preliminary Hearing of the Accused Lewis Johnson had that Preliminary Hearing been conducted in Canada.

3. That the signature "H.C. Shaw" appended to the said depositions and the initials "H.C.S" upon each page of the depositions are the signature and initials respec- tively of the said H.C. Shaw Esquire, Police Magistrate as aforesaid.
G. S. Howdward VICE COUNSUL OF THE UNITED STATES OF AMERICA
